parameters.query: SELECT name, TO_CHAR(date_begin,'YYYY-MM-DD') date_begin,  TO_CHAR(date_end,'YYYY-MM-DD') date_end FROM annual_backlogs where is_active=true
{{ $json.query }}
update personal_cost set h_executed = {{ $json.horas_total }} where employee='{{ $json.asignado_a.replace(/\s+/g, ' ').trim() }}'

SELECT
  v.name AS version,
  CONCAT(u.firstname, ' ', u.lastname) AS asignado_a,
  round(AVG(wp.done_ratio),2) AS progress,
  sum(wp.estimated_hours) as estimated_hours
FROM
  work_packages wp
JOIN
  statuses s ON wp.status_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN
  versions v ON wp.version_id = v.id
LEFT JOIN
  users u ON wp.assigned_to_id = u.id
WHERE
  wp.priority_id in (18,7) --18 Funcional
  AND v.name = '{{ $node["Backlog Activo"].json.name }}'
GROUP BY
  v.name,
  wp.assigned_to_id,
  u.firstname,
  u.lastname

--CANTIDAD DE TAREAS POR ESTADO
SELECT
  v.name AS version,
  CONCAT(u.firstname, ' ', u.lastname) AS asignado_a,
  s.name AS estado,
  count(*)

FROM
  work_packages wp
JOIN
  statuses s ON wp.status_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN
  versions v ON wp.version_id = v.id
LEFT JOIN
  users u ON wp.assigned_to_id = u.id
WHERE
  wp.priority_id in (18,7) --18 Funcional
  AND v.name = '{{ $('Code').item.json.name }}'
GROUP BY
  v.name,
  wp.assigned_to_id,
  u.firstname,
  u.lastname,
  s.name

SELECT 
    UPPER(TRIM(p.name)) AS proyecto,
    v.name AS version,
    COALESCE(cm_options.value, modulo.value, '-') AS modulo,
    COALESCE(ce_options.value, etapa.value, '-')  AS etapa,
    act.name AS actividad,
    (CASE pr.name WHEN 'Normal' THEN 'Funcional' ELSE pr.name END) AS prioridad,
    (u.firstname || ' ' || u.lastname) AS usuario_nombre,
    EXTRACT(YEAR  FROM te.spent_on)                                     AS anio,
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM te.spent_on)                                     AS mes_numero,
    EXTRACT(YEAR  FROM te.spent_on) || ' ' || TO_CHAR(te.spent_on,'TMMonth') AS mes_nombre,
    TO_CHAR(te.spent_on, 'IW')                                          AS semana_iso,
    ROUND(SUM(te.hours))                                                AS horas_total,
    ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(te.costs, 0)), 2)                                AS costo_usd
FROM time_entries te
JOIN work_packages wp ON wp.id = te.work_package_id
LEFT JOIN versions v  ON v.id = wp.version_id      -- si tu esquema usa fixed_version_id, cÃ¡mbialo
-- Campo personalizado: MÃ³dulo
LEFT JOIN custom_values  modulo     ON modulo.customized_id = wp.id AND modulo.custom_field_id = 11
LEFT JOIN custom_options cm_options ON cm_options.id::text = modulo.value AND cm_options.custom_field_id = 11
-- Campo personalizado: Etapa
LEFT JOIN custom_values  etapa      ON etapa.customized_id = wp.id AND etapa.custom_field_id = 10
LEFT JOIN custom_options ce_options ON ce_options.id::text = etapa.value AND ce_options.custom_field_id = 10
-- Actividad del parte de horas
LEFT JOIN enumerations act ON act.id = te.activity_id AND act.type = 'TimeEntryActivity'
-- Prioridad del work package (en enumerations)
LEFT JOIN enumerations pr  ON pr.id = wp.priority_id AND pr.type IN ('WorkPackagePriority','IssuePriority')
-- Proyecto
JOIN projects p ON p.id = wp.project_id
-- Usuario
JOIN users u ON u.id = te.user_id
WHERE 
  EXTRACT(YEAR  FROM te.spent_on) >= 2025
GROUP BY 
    p.name, v.name,
    COALESCE(cm_options.value, modulo.value, '-'),
    COALESCE(ce_options.value, etapa.value, '-'),
    act.name, pr.name,
    u.login, u.firstname, u.lastname,
    EXTRACT(YEAR  FROM te.spent_on),
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM te.spent_on),
    TO_CHAR(te.spent_on, 'TMMonth'),
    TO_CHAR(te.spent_on, 'IW')
ORDER BY 
    anio, mes_numero, semana_iso, proyecto, version, modulo, actividad, prioridad;

SELECT 
   UPPER(TRIM(p.name)) as proyecto,   
  ROUND(SUM(COALESCE(te.costs, 0)), 2) AS costo_usd
FROM 
    time_entries te
JOIN work_packages wp ON wp.id = te.work_package_id

-- Campo personalizado: MÃ³dulo
LEFT JOIN custom_values modulo ON modulo.customized_id = wp.id 
    AND modulo.custom_field_id = 11
LEFT JOIN custom_options cm_options ON cm_options.id::text = modulo.value 
    AND cm_options.custom_field_id = 11

-- Campo personalizado: Etapa
LEFT JOIN custom_values etapa ON etapa.customized_id = wp.id 
    AND etapa.custom_field_id = 10
LEFT JOIN custom_options ce_options ON ce_options.id::text = etapa.value 
    AND ce_options.custom_field_id = 10

-- Proyecto
JOIN projects p ON p.id = wp.project_id
WHERE 
    p.id = 81 --CARNIDEM
GROUP BY 
    p.name
ORDER BY 
    1;
TRUNCATE project_cost;

parameters.query:
select --cb.name,
(CASE cb.taxid
        WHEN '1793048285001'  THEN 'FASE 2 HAPPYCEL'
        WHEN '1793202388001'  THEN 'FASE 2 HAPPYPAY'
        WHEN '1791280792001'  THEN 'IMPLEMENTACION OPENBRAVO PETROWORLD'
        WHEN '1792181364001'  THEN 'FASE 2 UNNOPARTS'
        WHEN '1791293363001'  THEN 'IMPLEMENTACION OPENBRAVO CARNIDEM - CASA GUILLO'
    END) as project,

EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ci.dateinvoiced),
EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ci.dateinvoiced) || ' ' || (CASE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ci.dateinvoiced)
        WHEN 1  THEN 'January'
        WHEN 2  THEN 'February'
        WHEN 3  THEN 'March'
        WHEN 4  THEN 'April'
        WHEN 5  THEN 'May'
        WHEN 6  THEN 'June'
        WHEN 7  THEN 'July'
        WHEN 8  THEN 'August'
        WHEN 9  THEN 'September'
        WHEN 10 THEN 'October'
        WHEN 11 THEN 'November'
        WHEN 12 THEN 'December'
 END) as mes_nombre,
EXTRACT(MONTH FROM ci.dateinvoiced) as mes_numero,
0   AS total_horas,
0 AS total_costo,
sum(grandtotal) as ingresos
from c_invoice ci
left join c_bpartner cb on cb.c_bpartner_id=ci.c_bpartner_id
where ci.issotrx='Y' and EXTRACT(YEAR FROM ci.dateinvoiced)>=2025
--and c_doctype_id in ('901ED92690BC423493EA135D4990A3F2','')
--and cb.taxid in ('1793048285001', '1793202388001','1791280792001','1792181364001','1791293363001')
group by 1,2,3,4
order by 2,4 asc

SELECT
  u.id,
  CONCAT(u.firstname, ' ', u.lastname) AS asignado_a,
  SUM(te.hours) AS horas_total
FROM
  time_entries te
JOIN
  users u ON te.user_id = u.id
WHERE
  te.spent_on BETWEEN '{{ $node["Backlog Activo"].json.date_begin }}' AND '{{ $node["Backlog Activo"].json.date_end }}'
  and u.id in (34,33,14,13,19,66,35,28)
GROUP BY
   u.id,u.firstname, u.lastname
ORDER BY
  u.id DESC;

SELECT name, date_begin, date_end FROM annual_backlogs where is_active=true;
select distinct backlog from employee_advance

--CONSULTA DE PROGRESO Y HORAS ESTIMADAS
SELECT
  v.name AS version,
  CONCAT(u.firstname, ' ', u.lastname) AS asignado_a,u.id,
  round(AVG(wp.done_ratio),2) AS progress,
  sum(wp.estimated_hours) as estimated_hours
FROM
  work_packages wp
JOIN
  statuses s ON wp.status_id = s.id
LEFT JOIN
  versions v ON wp.version_id = v.id
LEFT JOIN
  users u ON wp.assigned_to_id = u.id
WHERE
  wp.priority_id in (18,7) --18 Funcional
  AND v.name = '{{ $('Backlog Activo1').item.json.name }}'
  and u.id in (34,33,14,13,19,66,35,28)
GROUP BY
  v.name,
  wp.assigned_to_id,
  u.firstname,
  u.lastname, u.id

--CANTIDAD DE TAREAS POR ESTADO
SELECT
  v.name AS version,
  CONCAT(u.firstname, ' ', u.lastname) AS asignado_a,
  count(*)

FROM
  work_packages wp
LEFT JOIN
  versions v ON wp.version_id = v.id
LEFT JOIN
  users u ON wp.assigned_to_id = u.id
WHERE
  wp.priority_id in (18,7) --18 Funcional
  AND v.name = '{{ $('Backlog Activo1').item.json.name }}'
  and u.id in (34,33,14,13,19,66,35,28)
GROUP BY
  v.name,
  wp.assigned_to_id,
  u.firstname,
  u.lastname

SELECT
  COUNT(*)::int       AS cant,
  MAX(employee)       AS employee,
  MAX(code)           AS code,
  MAX(phone)          AS phone
FROM manager_codes
WHERE code ={{ $('On form submission').item.json.Codigo }} ;
